content: {"locationId": "1193", "organizationId": "1044", "name": "FISH of McHenry Food Pantry", "address1": "3515 N. Richmond Road", "address2": "", "city": "McHenry", "state": "IL", "zipCode": "60051", "country": null, "phone": "815-344-4717", "phoneExt": "", "website": "", "latitude": "42.3779934", "longitude": "-88.2729201", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "English", "features": "", "aboutUs": "FISH of McHenry is located off of N. Richmond Rd. (US Rt. 31) and Johnsburg Rd.  Turn west at the stoplight at Johnsburg Rd. and follow the road that goes behind the McHenry Moose Lodge.  Turn left at the green cyclone fence.  The food pantry is a long brown building on the south side of the parking lot directly across from the Senior Services Center.", "notes": "Since March of 2020, we have been serving anyone in need outdoors in a drive-up service model.  This method has proved to be very efficient for a quick and easy experience for all with plenty of choices of canned and dry goods, dairy products, fresh produce, frozen products and also personal care and household items.  Guests are allowed to visit the pantry for assistance once every 4 weeks.  Cars form a line and a volunteer will come to your vehicle and give you a Number for your car and a Shopping List to fill out.  Shopping Lists are collected and filled inside by volunteers.  Carts will be brought out to cars for loading.  ", "contactName": "", "contactPhone": "815-344-4717", "contactEmail": "fishinfo@fishofmchenry.org", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "Curbside Pickup / Drive Through, Grocery / Client Choice, Home Delivery Service, Lifting / Carrying Assistance, Outdoor Service, Pre-Packed Boxes / Bags", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "Dairy, Diapers, Eggs, Fruits & Vegetables, Household Products, Meat, Other, Prepared Food / Grab and Go, Shelf Stable/Non-Perishable Goods, Toiletries / Hygiene Products", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 2, "regionName": "Northern Illinois Food Bank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "dbf64577-4f05-4753-a6ec-ebbbd9c99e9c.png", "website": "solvehungertoday.org"}], "timeZoneName": "Central Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "CT", "offsetHours": "-5", "schedules": ["Tuesday 9:00 AM-11:30 AM", "Tuesday 4:30 PM-6:30 PM", "Thursday 9:00 AM-11:30 AM"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
